record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - April 30, 2008)

[Page: S3647]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is nothing more to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:01 p.m, adjourned until Thursday, May 1, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.
